EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-0530-AI-Optimize-Kubernetes.ES-2018-05-18-Cloud-Native-Leads.ES-2
EmailTemplate.subject: [You're Invited, {{lead.First Name:default= }}] Discover Self-Managing Kubernetes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Curious about how you can continuously optimize your Kubernetes clusters? Join Eva Tuczai, Advanced Engineering Engagement and Product Manager, and Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing and former systems architect, for our upcoming webinar, Self-Managing Kubernetes on May 30th at 11 am ET.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>
You'll learn how, with the help of our AI-powered decision engine, you can enable:
- Minimal human intervention
- Automated rescheduling of pods assures performance
- Intelligent cluster scaling ensures elastic infrastructure
- Full-stack control unites DevOps and infrastructure
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward. © Turbonomic, Inc.
